articles.title: Ukraine criticizes Canada over return of Nord Stream turbines - CTV News
articles.description: The Ukrainian government is calling on Canada to reconsider its decision to allow the delivery of turbines from a Russia-Europe natural gas pipeline to Germany, saying it sets a "dangerous precedent" when it comes to sanctions against the Russian regime.
articles.content:

articles.title: Blistering heat scorches Europe as Portugal wildfire injures 29 and officials warn of hotter, changing climate - Sky News
articles.content:
Forest fires in Portugal have left 29 people injured, as temperatures are predicted to reach up to 45C (113F) in parts of the country from Tuesday.

articles.title: Shahid Kapoor roasts Mira Rajput over makeup post: Didn’t wait to leave bathroom - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Shahid Kapoor joked about Mira Rajput's latest post about her makeup. Earlier, she gave a peek at Shahid playing with Misha during their Europe tour. Check out the posts here.
articles.content: Actor Shahid Kapoor roasted his wife Mira Rajput over her latest post on makeup. Taking to Instagram on Sunday, Mira shared a selfie as she posed inside a bathroom. She wrote, "#nofilter makeup by me… [+2281 chars]
